name: bibi1d
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: 3bitr4g(w0, wb(w1, w2), wb(w3, w2), wb(w2, w1), wb(w2, w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wb(w1, w2), wb(w3, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wb(w2, w1), wb(w2, w3)))
-| wb(wb(w1, w2), wb(w2, w1))
-| wb(wb(w3, w2), wb(w2, w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wb(w1, w2), wb(w3, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wb(w2, w1), wb(w2, w3)))
-| wb(wb(w1, w2), wb(w2, w1))
-| wb(wb(w3, w2), wb(w2, w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wb(w2, w1), wb(w2, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wb(w1, w2), wb(w3, w2)))
-| wb(wb(w1, w2), wb(w2, w1))
-| wb(wb(w3, w2), wb(w2, w3))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w3))

|- wi(w0, wb(wb(w1, w2), wb(w3, w2)))
-| wb(wb(w3, w2), wb(w2, w3))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w3))

|- wi(w0, wb(wb(w1, w2), wb(w3, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w3))

comment: Deduction adding a biconditional to the right in an equivalence. (Contributed by NM, 11-May-1993.)
